---
category: news
title: "Biomedical Innovations from Women Less Likely to be Adopted: Study"
excerpt: "A study published Monday (August 30) by the National Bureau of Economic Research finds that new ideas in biomedical research are less likely to spread when they are generated by women and minorities than when generated by men."
